docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 19 -- In the highest quarters here the impression gained is that when the Uruguayan Government let it be known that it "was studying" a plan to grant naval facilities to the United States, as in the last war, that was a...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 19 -- In the highest quarters here the impression gained is that when the Uruguayan Government let it be known that it "was studying" a plan to grant naval facilities to the United States, as in the last war, that was a diplomatic way of indicating what amounted to a decision to do so.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan attitude on naval facilities grant to U S discussed

docs.snippet: Due to control measures embracing all currencies of Continental Europe not hitherto banned and announced at the preceding week-end, business in the foreign exchange market last week dropped to its lowest point of inactivity in history, even when...
docs.lead_paragraph: Due to control measures embracing all currencies of Continental Europe not hitherto banned and announced at the preceding week-end, business in the foreign exchange market last week dropped to its lowest point of inactivity in history, even when comparison is made with the post-War No. 1 period of a quarter century ago when some activity prevailed in the major European currencies.
